pkgmetadata.longdescription: # myria-ec2-ansiblePython package for deploying Myria on Amazon EC2## How to set up a Myria cluster on EC2For local development, clone this repository, set up a virtual environment using `virtualenv`, and use the following command (run from the repository root directory) to install the package while allowing editing _in situ_:```pip install --upgrade --editable .```To deploy a Myria cluster using this package, or to install this package for non-development use, please refer to the [Myria Cloud Deployment](http://myria.cs.washington.edu/docs/myria-ec2.html) documentation.
